name: Mr. Reed's Basics in Science and Cells
name_original: Mr. Reed's Basics in Science and Cells
description:
Plot

Oh No! you failed you're science test! But Mr. Reed will give you another chance tommorow!

Levels

The Boys Bathroom
Mcdonalds
Safeway
Abandoned House
The Beach
Space
65,000,000 years in the past
65,000,000 years in the future
The Forest
Unkown
Hell
& Heaven

Credits

Made by: Hayden Prindel and Archer Wineland

Engine: RPG Maker MV

Made For: Science Class

A Word

I originally made the game and put it on gamejolt under the name "Coolness Games." So if you see "Coolness Games" anywhere in the game, you know why.

Controls

arrow keys - move

z - action button

x - inventory/save

esc - exit game/main menu
